titleStmt.title: An ease for a diseased man Published for the instruction of those which are visited with sicknesse of body; especially those which being infected with the contagious pestilence are debarred from the publike ministery of the word, and the comfortable societie of their brethren. by M.M.
titleStmt.author: M. M., fl. 1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Iones, and are to be sold by Iohn Wright [Senior], dwelling without New-gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
